item.title: Fasteroids - An Asteroids-like game for Linux and Windows
item.description:
Reviving an old project

Today I realized that, since redoing this web site, I still havenâ€™t added any information about the game I made back in 2017-2020. Recently I revived Fasteroids, and made some changes to both simplify the game, but also with the idea that the game should be able to scale to 4k in the near future.

Before I ramble on more, you can download Fasteroids for Linux or Windows from:
